creator: Davin, Nicholas Flood, 1843-1901. (author)
description: Davin, Nicholas Flood: 1843-1901. Born Limerick, Ireland; after a promising career as lawyer and war correspondent in Britain went to Toronto as journalist, 1872; settled in Regina and established Leader, 1883, first newspaper in Assiniboia; sat in House of Commons, 1887-1900; influential through Leader and in House of Commons in speaking for the West (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Davin's defence in a libel suit filed by Atkinson, editor of the rival paper.
